column4: Hm, so this is the error im getting when i click reload on synaptic, "W: GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net karmic Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 5A9BF3BB4E5E17B5"
Give me one second to paste the command.
In terminal: gpg --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv 4E5E17B5, and then gpg --export --armor 4E5E17B5 | sudo apt-key add -
